text: Rajan Saxena was born on 01-03- in Lucknow and is Dean and Head of the Department of Surgical Gastroenterology at Sanjay Gandhi Postgraduate Institute of Medical Sciences, Lucknow, a medical institution of national importance in India and Padma Shri (2004) awardee. He is an alumnus of the Postgraduate Institute of Medical Education and Research, and specialises in hepatobiliary pancreatic and liver transplant surgery. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Indian gastroenterologists Category:Recipients of the Padma Shri in medicine Category:20th-century Indian medical doctors Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Rajan Saxena (physician)
